summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.9°C) and outside temperature (down 2.0°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 803 m) and light levels (up 11868 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 13859 lux), cloud levels (up 1500 m), feels like temperature (up 4.9°C), and outside temperature (up 3.6°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 802.9m lower than yesterday, 609.5m lower than the past week, 1499.8m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1183.6m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Showers, occasional overcast conditions, and overcast conditions will limit sunlight. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
